Holding down the middle mouse button and using the trackpoint to scroll a web page doesn't work in Firefox 4.0. The scroll icon appears when holding down the middle mouse button, but then by using the red trackpoint on the keyboard of a Thinkpad X61s, the web page isn't scrolling.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. hold down the middle mouse button
2. try to use the trackpoint to scroll

Actual Results:  
web page not scrolling

Expected Results:  
web page scrolling

This problem should at least occur on any Thinkpad with a trackpoint and trackpoint software setting middle mouse button to scroll.
